prod_short_desc: Safety check the LEGO® DUPLO® Little Plane, then head for the skies!
prod_long_desc:
Little pilots will enjoy hours of flying with this Little Plane with turning propeller. Encourage early construction skills by building the radar tower with turning radar, then show your child how to check everything is safe before the flight. LEGO® DUPLO® bricks are specially designed to be safe for little hands and the simple build means they can take off sooner! Includes a pilot DUPLO figure.
Includes a pilot LEGO® DUPLO® figure.
Features a plane with turning propeller and a radar tower with turning radar.
Accessories include a fuel can and bricks decorated as a tool, wrenches and dials as story starters.
Make all the right checks with the pilot before he takes off.
Encourage role-play skills by creating endless flying adventures.
Help your child master basic building skills with this simple model.
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be safe and suitable forlittle hands.
Plane measures over 3” high, 5” long and 5” wide.
Radar tower measures over 5” high, 2” wide and 2” long.
Makes an ideal addition to any LEGO® DUPLO® Town collection.
